 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-May-2018.)
statement:
cbv3h.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
cbv3h.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
cbv3h.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
cbv3h $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
